All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonCollection
public class Scripts
extends JsonObject

Represents the scripts entry in a composer package

Author:
Thomas Gossmann
See Also:
http://getcomposer.org/doc/articles/scripts.md, http://getcomposer.org/doc/04-schema.md#scripts
